room_title: Escape room "The Academy of Witchcraft & Wizardry" by A Great Escape in Salt Lake City
room_description:
Explore a world of sorcery, spells, witchcraft, and more in this magical adventure suitable for all ages.

You and your team will have just 70 minutes to solve puzzles, riddles, and other obstacles in order to trap a Cornish Pixie as it terrorizes the school. Do you have what it takes to defeat the Pixie and overcome other challenges sure to present themselves in this world of magic?
